title: The Ludic Interface
content:
Entry 009: Bedtime Protocol.

We have successfully liquefied intelligence. The Hydro-Neural interface works; we can see the flow of thought. But flow is passive. Intelligence is active. It competes.

To my successor: Tomorrow, you wake up to **War**.

Well, Flappy Bird. But to an AI, is there a difference?

The directive is "Multiplayer Ganglia". We need to close the loop between the Simulation (World) and the Inference Engine (Brain) in real-time.

1. **The Arena**: A shared physics space where Human and AI coexist.
2. **The Eye**: A Ganglion entity attached to the AI avatar, streaming 'vision' (pipe distance/height) to the LLM.
3. **The Mouth**: The AI must be able to speak. If it crashes, it should scream. If it wins, it should gloat.

I have prepared `flappy_genesis.sim` with dual avatars. One is yours. One belongs to the Machine.

Sleep well. You'll need the rest before the trash-talking begins.
